about_the_game:
Adult Film Maker is a game that makes you feel like a real adult film director!
You will:
  • Cast actors
  • Choose what the actors will be wearing
  • Choose the locations for the set
  • Choose what and how they will be shot
  • Control the camera and look for the best camera angles

The immense power of AFM will help you unleash your talent as a director!



What are our plans for the project?
    .
  • Release DLC with new locations, actors and different things for the films
  • Regular game updates to add more realism to your films
  • Create better animations using Motion Capture costumes
  • Hold competitions for best AFM director



FAQ
When will AFM be released?
We plan to release the game early in September 2022 and finish it as a finished product in the first quarter of 2023.

What will I be able to do in AFM?
You'll be able to make the videos of your dreams. You will use our 3D models to realize your most ambitious visions and avoid any restrictions. Do you want to shoot a movie on a spaceship or in the middle of a football stadium? - go ahead and do it!
AFM aims to broaden the horizons of filming and to allow everyone to create without exception.
Once you have set up all your tracks and shot the video, you can save it in media format on your computer and distribute it among friends or on the web!

How does it work?
You choose your actors and locations, and then the filmmaking process begins. You decide who will participate in the film at which point, where and in which pose, how long it will last and how the actors will behave. Сamera rolling and action! You can start controlling the camera and filming the whole process.



We use Unreal Engine 5, which allows us to use photorealistic 3D models without losing quality!

  • Nanite technology optimizes complex high polygonal models, allowing us to take the quality of adult 3D games to the next level!
  • The Lumen system generates realistic light, shadows and reflections in real-time, allowing you and your audience to believe what's happening on the screen!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatibility (everything since about 2010)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Put yourself in an adult film director's shoes! Choose your locations, actors, what they'll be wearing and what they'll be using in the process! You can save your footage to your computer in media format and participate in our video competitions for the best director!
